content.question: Many American Indians of the 1890s responded to policies such as those of the Carlisle Indian Industrial School by

choices.label: seeking to preserve their cultural and tribal identities

content.answer: seeking to preserve their cultural and tribal identities

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development
